actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to authorize the burial in national cemeteries of the surviving parents of deceased servicemen who were unmarried at the time of death.

summary.text: Authorizes the burial in national cemeteries of the unmarried surviving parents of deceased servicemen. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1002(5))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to authorize the burial in national cemeteries of the surviving parents of deceased servicemen who were unmarried at the time of death.
